name: field (Terminal.Insight)
description:
a very short game based on a dream i had once
made in about 8 hours of work, be nice please <3

nothing is after you
nothing will jump out at you
there are no sudden loud noises

that doesn't mean everything is okay

1.1 update:

  • new sky
  • audio rebalanced
  • visual renderer rebalanced
  • ending framed better

- - -
escape instantly closes the game
mac and linux builds untested
